definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bind (Ar. rataqa close up and repair, sew up; Talm. [[רִיתְקָא]] fenced enclosure);—

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[רֻתְּקוּ בַזִּקִּים]] Na 3:10 her great ones were bound with fetters

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יֵרָתֵק]] Ec 12:6 Qr ([[ירחק]] Kt), from context = be snapped, broken; read prob. [[יִנׇּתֵק]] (Pfannkuche Thes and mod.).
